name: Kids Quiz: Midnight for Charlie Bone: 10 Questions |  Kid Lit Authors

questions.text: What school does Charlie go to?
questions.explanation:
Bloor's Academy.

	Bloor's Academy is a school for students who are talented in either art, music, or drama.  It is also for kids who have special talents, called endowments.

travelling through pictures.

	Charlie can listen to what is happening in pictures, no matter how old they are.  Sometimes he can meet the subjects of the pictures.  Charlie's friend Billy can talk to animals, and one of Charlie's friends can create illusions, as we find out in the later books.

questions.text: What is Charlie's best friend named, who does not go to the same school?
questions.explanation:
Benjamin Brown.

	Benjamin lives just down the street from Charlie.  Fidelio and Gabriel are two of his friends at Bloor's, and Rupe Small is an annoying boy who sleeps in the same dorm as Charlie.

Runner Bean.

	Runner Bean is mentioned often throughout the whole series.  The other three names are common dog names.

Lost.

	He was believed to be dead, but Gabriel Silk used his endowment to discover that Lyell Bone was still alive.  Read the rest of the series to find out more about him!

questions.text: Both of Charlie's grandmas are very nice, and love him dearly.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Maisie, Charlie's Grandma on his mother's side, is a very nice person and cares a lot about Charlie.  Lyell's mother is very grumpy, and couldn't care less about Charlie.  No Grandpas are mentioned in any of the books.

questions.text: Who is Charlie descended from, who gave him his endowment?
questions.explanation:
Red King & The Red King.

	The Red King was a magician who had ten children, all with special talents.  Charlie is descended from the King's youngest daughter, Amoret.

questions.text: What is Grandma Bone's maiden name?
questions.explanation:
Yewbeam.

	Grandma Bone lives with her brother Paton, Charlie, Maisie, and Amy (Charlie's mom).  She has three evil sisters named Lucretia, Eustacia, and Venetia Yewbeam.  Her first name is Grizelda.

questions.text: Who is the matron at Bloor's?
questions.explanation:
Lucretia Yewbeam.

	Lucretia does her best to make life miserable for Charlie at Bloor's.  Grizelda is Charlie's grandma.  Venetia, Eustacia, and Lucretia are his great aunts.

questions.text: Charlie is in music at school.  What color cape does he have to wear?
questions.explanation:
blue.

	Music students wear blue, art students wear green, and drama students wear purple.  Nobody wears red.  All students must wear the right cape, or they will get detention.
